Who We Are

Talk to Us

Be part of the global conversation

We travel the globe bringing you the best conversations around entrepreneurship and innovation.

Inspiring a new generation of founders, inventors and creatives, we tell authentic stories and spotlight the people building tomorrow.

In the age of Wikipedia, Youtube, and Google, we think there’s more to learning than classrooms and lectures, and we’re on a mission to reimagine how we develop entrepreneurship capability across the globe.

At every event and in each destination we've travelled to, we've heard incredible stories and learned powerful lessons. We believe every entrepreneur has something to share with the world.

Join the conversation with us!
